articles.author: John Wagner, Mariana Alfaro
articles.title: Post Politics Now: Biden headed to Detroit to highlight investment in electric vehicles - The Washington Post
articles.description: The president plans to tour the North American International Auto Show and tout funding to build a network of chargers across the country that was included in the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law that he signed last year.

articles.title: North American markets tumble, with U.S. stocks posting worst drop since June 2020 - CP24
articles.description: North American markets tumbled Tuesday after the latest reading on U.S. inflation disappointed traders, with Canada's main stock index down more than 300 points and all three major U.S. stock indexes seeing their worst day since June 2020.
